local_schema.short_desc: Ko za'a nuna fayiloli na goyon baya
local_schema.longdesc: Idan an shirya zuwa gaske, ana nuna fayloli na tallafawa misali kamar waɗanda shirin Emacs ta ƙiƙiro. Ayanzu, sai fayilolin da suka ƙare cikin tsarin tilde (~) ake la'akari kamar fayiloli na goyon baya.

local_schema.short_desc: Ko za'a nuna fayilolin da aka ɓoye
local_schema.longdesc: Idan an shirya zuwa gaske, to za'a nuna fayilolin da aka ɓoye a cikin manajan fayil. Akan lissafa fayilolin da aka ɓoye cikin tsarin dotfiles ko kuma cikin .hidden file na shamis.
In da gaske, za'a nuna motsin kifi a juye kan fanel masu tsaye.

local_schema.short_desc: Ɗan hutu ga ko wani firam
local_schema.longdesc: Wannan maɓalli na ƙayyade yawan sakan da za'a nuna ko wacca firam.
Wannan maɓalli na ƙayyade yawan firam da za'a nuna cikin shirin motsin kifi.

local_schema.short_desc: Umarnin da za'a zartar da kan danne
local_schema.longdesc: Wannan maɓalli na ƙayyade umarni da za'a ƙoƙarta a zartar da idan an danna kifin.
Wannan maɓalli na ƙayyade sunanfayil na pixmap da za'a amfanida wa sura mai motsi da aka nuna cikin applet ɗin kifi, amma ya danganta ga gafakan pixmap.
Idan kifi bai da suna, ya kan zama mai maras ban sha'awa. Ka ba da kifin ka suna don ya sami rayuwa mai kyau.

local_schema.short_desc: Motsa tagogi zuwa filinaiki da ake kai yanzu idan an cire tsuke
local_schema.longdesc: In da gaske, ka motsa shi zuwa filin aiki da kake kai yanzu, idan kana cire tsukewa ga taga. Idan ba haka ba, sai ka sauya zuwa filin aiki na tagan.

local_schema.short_desc: Lokacin da za'a iya kasa tagogi cikin ƙungiyoyi
local_schema.longdesc: Yana yanke shawarar lokacin da za'a kasa tagogi cikin ƙungiyoyi daga shirin ayuka guɗa, a kan jerin tagan. Kima masu yiwu sune "kar a taɓa", "farat ɗaya" da "kullum".
In da gaske, jerin taga zai nuna tagogi daga duk filayen aiki. In ba haka ba, kawai, zai nuna tagogi daga filin aiki da ake kai yanzu.

Yawan saurin da surori masu motsi na fanel zasu fara yi. Kima masu yiwu sune "maras sauri", "madaidaici" da "mai sauri". Wannan maɓalli na da amfani kawai idan maɓalli na fara_surori masu motsi na gaske ne.

local_schema.short_desc: Pixels da ana iya gani idan an ɓoye
local_schema.longdesc: Yana ƙayyade yawan pixel da ana iya gani idan an ɓoye fanel farat ɗaya cikin wata lungu. Wannan maɓalli na da amfani kawai idan maɓallin ɓoyewa_farat ɗaya na gaske ne.

local_schema.short_desc: Dakatawa da cire ɓoyewar fanel farat ɗaya
local_schema.longdesc: Yana ƙayyade yawan dakatawa na millisakan bayan manunin ta shigo wurin fanel kafin a sake-nuna fanel ɗin farat ɗaya. Wannan maɓalli na da amfani kawai idan maɓallin ɓoyewa-farat ɗaya na gaske ne.

local_schema.short_desc: Dakatawa da ɓoye fanel farat ɗaya
local_schema.longdesc: Yana ƙayyade yawan dakatawa na millisakan bayan da manuni ta bar wurin fanel kafin a ɓoye fanel farat ɗaya. Wannan maɓalli na da amfani kawai idan maɓallin ɓoyewa-farat ɗaya na gaske ne.
In da gaske, za'a saka kibiyoyi kan maɓallun ɓoyarwa. Wannan maɓalli na da amfani kawai idan maɓallun_farawa gaske ne.
In da gaske, za'a saka maɓallu kan ko wacca gefe na fanel wanda za'a iya amfani da wajen motsa fanel zuwa bakin fuskar kwamfyutan, ya bar kawai maɓalli guda mai nunawa.
In da gaske, za'a mai da shirin ɓoyewa da cire-ɓoyewa na wannan fanel zuwa mai motsi maimakon da mai farawa nan take.

local_schema.short_desc: Ɓoye fanel cikin gefe farat ɗaya
local_schema.longdesc: In da gaske, za'a ɓoye fanel farat ɗaya cikin lungun fuskar kwamfyuta idan manuni ta bar wurin fanel. Idan ka sake motsa mauni zuwa lungun, zai jawo fanel ɗin ya sake-nunawa.

local_schema.short_desc: Fanel na tsakiya mai kan y-axis
Fanel na tsakiya mai kan x-axis

local_schema.longdesc: Wurin da aka saka fanel ta bakin y-axis. Wannan maɓalli na da amfani kawai cikin shirin cire-faɗi. Idan yana cikin shirin faɗaɗawa, za'a ƙyale maɓallin kuma a saka fanel a bakin fuskar kwamfyutan da maɓallin juyi ta ƙayyade.

Wurin da aka sa fanel a bakin x-axis. Wannan maɓallin na da amfani kawai idan yana cikin shirin cire-faɗi. Idan yana cikin shirin faɗaɗawa, za'a ƙyale wannan maɓalli kuma a saka fanel a bakin fuskar kwamfyutan wanda maɓallin juyi ta ƙayyade.

Tsawon (faɗi wa fanel a tsaye) fanel ɗin. Fanel ɗin zai ƙudura girmar a ƙalla, a lokacin tafiyar da aikin kan girmar nau'in rubutu da wasu alamomi. An daidaita iyaka girmar zuwa rubu'in taswon fuskar kwamfyutan (ko faɗin).

Juyin fanel. Kima masu yiwu sune "sama", "ƙasa", "hagu", "dama". Idan yana cikin shirin faɗaɗawa, maɓallin zai ƙayyade bakin fuskar kwamfyuta wanda fanel ke kai. Idan kuma yana cikin shirin cire-faɗi, bambanci tsakanin "sama" da "ƙasa" zai rage da muhimmi - tare, suna nuna cewa wannan fanel a kwance ne - amma, suna ƙara bada alama mai amfani game da yanda yakamata wasu abubuwan fanel su nuna hali. Misali, a wani fanel na "sama", wani maɓallin mazaɓa zai nuno mazaɓensa ƙarƙashin fanel ɗin, kuwa kan fanel na "ƙasa", za'a fito da mazaɓen a saman fanel.

local_schema.short_desc: Faɗaɗa don ya cika duk faɗin fuskar kwamfyuta
local_schema.longdesc: In da gaske, fanel ɗin zai mamaye duk faɗin fuskar kwamfyutan (da tsayi idan wannan fanel na tsaye). Cikin wannan shiri, za'a iya saka fanel a bakin fuskar kwamfyuta kawai. Idan ƙarya ne, fanel ɗin zai kai girma wanda zai iya saukar da su applet, shirin gabatarwa, da maɓallu.

local_schema.short_desc: Allon kwamfyutan Xinerama a wurin da ake nuna fanel
local_schema.longdesc: Cikin tsarin Xinerama, kana iya samun fanel masu yawa kan kowacca fuskar kwamfyuta guda. Wannan maɓalli na gane allon kwamfyuta da ke nuna fanel yanzu.

local_schema.short_desc: X fuskan kwamfyuta a wurin da ake nuna fanel
local_schema.longdesc: Da fuskar kwamfyuta mai ƙwar-biyu, kana iya samun fanel kan kowace fuskar kwamfyuta daban. Wannan maɓalli na gane fuskar kwamfyutan da aka nuna fanel ciki yanzu.

local_schema.short_desc: Sunan da za'a gane fanel da shi
local_schema.longdesc: Wannan suna, na wanda mutun zai iya karanta ne kuma za ka iya amfani da shi wajen gane wani fanel. Babbar amfanin sa shine ya yi aiki a matsayin sunan tagan fanel da ke da amfani idan ana neman hanya tsakanin fanel.

local_schema.short_desc: Juya zane kan fanel masu tsaye
local_schema.longdesc: In da gaske, za'a yi juya zanen bango idan an juyin fanel a tsaye yake.
In da gaske, za'a taƙaita zanen zuwa girmar fanel. Ba za'a kula da rabon faɗi da tsawon surar ba.
In da gaske, za'a taƙaita zanen (zai riƙe rabon faɗi da tsawo, watau asfekt reshiyo na zanen) zuwa tsawon fanel (idan a kwance yake).
Yana ƙayyade fayil da za'a yi amfani da wa zanen bangon. Idan zanen na ƙunsa da hanyar alfa, watau za'a haɗa shi kan zanen bangon kwamfyutan tebur.
Yana ƙayyade shirin hana haske na tsarin launin bangon. Idan launin ba mai cikakken shirin hana haske ba (mai kima kasa da 65535), watau, za'a haɗa launin cikin zanen bangon kwamfyutan tebur.
Yana ƙayyade launin bango wa fanel cikin tsarin #RGB.

Wacca irin bango ya kamata a yi amfani da wa wannan fanel. Kima masu yiwuwa sune "gtk" - za'a yi amfani da difwakt na GTK+ bangon widget, "launi" - za'a yi amfani da maɓallin launi kamar launin bango ko "zane" - za'a yi amfani da zanen da maɓallin zane ta ƙayyade zai zama bango.

local_schema.short_desc: Canza tsari na tsohon siffa sun ƙaura
local_schema.longdesc: Wata tutan boolean mai nuna ko an kwafe canza tsari na baya, wanda mai amfani da, yayi cikin /apps/panel/profiles/default zuwa sabuwar wurin a cikin /apps/panel.

Wani jerin shaidar abun fanel. Kowace shaida na gane abun fanel guda (mislai, shiri mai gabatar da aiki, maɓallin aiki, ko kuma maɓalli/layin mazaɓa). An adana kayan daidaita kowace cikin abubuwan a cikin /apps/panel/objects/$(id).
Wani jerin shaidar applet na fanel. Kowace shaida na gane applet ɗin fanel guda. An adana kayan daidaita kowace applet cikin /apps/fanel/applets/$(id)
Wata jerin shaidar fanel. Kowace shaida na gane kowaca fanel guda ɗaya mai babbarmatsayi. Ana adana kayan daidaita kowace fanel cikin /apps/panel/toplevels/$(id).

local_schema.short_desc: Fara gamawa farat ɗaya cikin zauren akwatin bayanin "Tafiyar da Shirin Ayuka"
local_schema.longdesc: In da gaske, za'a samar da shirin gamawa farat ɗaya cikin zauren akwatin bayani na "Tafiyar da Shirin Ayuka".

local_schema.short_desc: Faɗaɗa jerin shiri cikin zauren akwatin bayani na "Tafiyar da Shirin Ayuka"
local_schema.longdesc: In da gaske, za'a faɗaɗa zauren akwatin bayani na "Shiryoyin Ayuka da Aka Sani" da aka lissafa cikin "Tafiyar da Shirin Ayuka" idan an buɗe zauren akwatin bayanin. Wannan maɓalli na da amfani kawai idan maɓallin fara_shirin_jeri na gaske ne.

local_schema.short_desc: Fara jerin shiri cikin zauren akwatin bayani na "Tafiyar da Shirin Ayuka"
local_schema.longdesc: In da gaske, za'a samar da zauren akwatin bayanin lissafin "Shiryoyin Ayuka da Aka Sani" wanda aka lissafa cikin "Tafiyar da Shirin Ayuka". Maɓallin nuna_jerin_shiri na sarrafa ko an faɗaɗa jerin ko ba'a yi ba idan an nuna zauren akwatin bayanin.
In da gaske, fanel ɗin zai cire hanya zuwa maɓallin tilasta daina aiki don ya hana mai amfani da ya tilasta wa shirin ayuka ya daina aiki.
In da gaske, fanel ɗin zai cire hanya zuwa bayanen da aka shigar na mazaɓen fitarwa, don ya hana mai amfani da shi fitarwa daga aiki.

local_schema.short_desc: Applet IIDs da za'a kashe don kada su yi lodi
local_schema.longdesc: Wani jerin IIDs na applet da fanel zai ƙyale. Hakan, zaka iya kashe wasu applet don kada su iya lodi ko nunawa cikin mazaɓen. Misali, idan za ka kashe applet ɗin ƙaramin-kwammanda, ka ƙara 'OAFIID:GNOME_MiniCommanderApplet' zuwa wannan jeri. Sai ka sake fara fanel kafin gyaran ta fara aiki.
In da gaske, fanel ɗin ba zai yarda da canje-canje zuwa canza tsari na fanel ba. Amma, kila za'a buƙata a kulle kowace applet guda dabam. Sai an sake fara fanel kafin wannan ya fara aiki.

local_schema.short_desc: Haskata masu gabatar da kan shirin jarraba wurin linzami
local_schema.longdesc: In da gaske, za'a haskata wata shirin gabatarwa idan mai amfani da shi ya motsa manuni kan sa.
In da gaske, za'a nuna wata zauren akwatin bayani don ya tambayi tabbaci idan mai amfani da shi na son cire wani fanel.
In da gaske, za'a rufe wata durowa farat ɗaya idan mai amfani da shi ya danna wata shirin gabatarwa cikinsa.
In da gaske, za'a nuna shawarar kayan aiki wa abubuwa cikin fanel.

Irin aiki da wannan maɓalli na wakiltar da. Kima masu yiuwa sune "kulle", "fitarwa", "tafiyar da", "nemi" da "ɗau hoton fuskar kwamfyuta". Wannan maɓallin na da amfani kawai idan nau'in maɓallin_abun shine "action-applet".
Wurin .fayil na kwamfyutan tebur da ke bayyana shirin mai gabatarwa. Wannan maɓalli na da amfani kawai idan nau'in maɓallin_abun shine "abu-mai gabatawa"
Hanya wanda aka tsara kayan cikin mazaɓa daga ciki. Wannan maɓalli na da amfani kawai idan maɓallin yi amfani da_hanyar_mazaɓa gaske ne da kuma idan maɓallin nau'in_abun shine "abun-mazaɓa".

local_schema.short_desc: Yi amfani da hanyar ɗabi'a wa kayan cikin mazaɓa
local_schema.longdesc: In da gaske, ana amfani da maɓallin hanyar_mazaɓa kamar hanyar da za'a gina kayan cikin mazaɓa daga ciki. Idan babu gaskiya, za'a ƙyale maɓallin hanyar_mazaɓa. Wannan maɓallin na da amfani kawai idan maɓallin nau'in_abun shine "abun-mazaɓa".

local_schema.short_desc: Alama da ake amfani da wa maɓallin abu
local_schema.longdesc: Wurin fayil ɗin surar da aka yi amfani da kamar wata alama wa maɓallin abun. Wannan maɓalli na da amfani kawai idan nau'in maɓallin_abun shine "abun-durowa" ko kuma "abun-mazaɓa" kuma maɓallin yi amfani da_ɗabi'ar_alama, gaske ne.

local_schema.short_desc: Yi amfanida alamar ɗabi'a wa maɓallin abun
local_schema.longdesc: In da gaske, za'a yi amfani da maɓallin alamar_ɗabi'ar kamar alamar ɗabi'a wa maɓallin. Idan babu gaskiya, za'a ƙyale maɓallin alamar_ɗabi'a. Wannan maɓalli na da amfani kawai idan maɓallin nau'in_abu ne "abun-mazaɓa" ko "abun-durowa".

local_schema.short_desc: Shawarar kayan aiki da aka nuna wa durowa ko mazaɓa
local_schema.longdesc: Rubutun da za'a nuna cikin wani shawarar kayan aiki wa wannan durowa ko mazaɓa. Wannan maɓalli na da amfani kawai idan nau'in maɓallin_abun shine "abun_durowa" ko "abun-mazaɓa".
Mai gane fanel da aka haɗa zuwa wannan durowa. Wannan maɓalli na da amfani kawai idan maɓallin nau'in-abun shine "abun-durowa".
In da gaske, kada mai amfani da ya motsa applet sai ya yi amfani da abunmazaɓan "Cire Makulli" don ya samu ya buɗe abun da makulli

local_schema.short_desc: Ka bayyana wurin zuwa ƙasa/gefen dama
local_schema.longdesc: In da gaske, za'a bayyana wurin abun zuwa (ko ƙasa idan a tsaye ya ke) gefen dama na fanel.
Wurin wannan abun fanel. Yawan pixel daga gefen fanel ta hagu (ko sama idan a tsaye yake) na ƙayyade wurin.

local_schema.short_desc: Fanel na matsayi babba mai ƙunsa da abu
local_schema.longdesc: Mai gane fanel mai babbar matsayi da ke ƙunsa da wannan abu.

local_schema.short_desc: Layuka kwance cikin mai sauya filin aiki
local_schema.longdesc: Wannan maɓalli na ƙayyade yawan layuka kwance (wa tsari mai kwance) ko layuka tsaye (wa tsari mai tsaye) da mai sauya filin aiki zai nuna filayen aiki ciki. Wannan maɓallin na da amfani kawai idan maɓallin nuna_duk_filayenaiki, na gaske ne.
In da gaske, mai sauya filin aiki zai nuna duk filayen aiki. Idan ba haka ba, zai nuna filin aiki da kake kai yanzu kawai.

local_schema.short_desc: Yi Amfani da Lokaci na Intanet
local_schema.longdesc: Amfanin wannan maɓalli ya zama deprikated cikin shirin GNOME na 2.6, aka goyi bayan maɓallin 'fomat'. An riƙe wannan skima don a sami dacewa da tsohon sigogi.

local_schema.short_desc: Yi Amfani da Lokaci na UNIX
local_schema.longdesc: Amfanin wannan maɓalli ya zama deprikated cikin shirin GNOME na 2.6, aka goyi bayan maɓallin 'fomat'. An riƙe wannan skima don a sami dacewa da tsohon sigogi.
Amfanin wannan maɓalli ya zama deprikated cikin shirin GNOME na 2.6, aka goyi bayan maɓallin 'fomat'. An riƙe wannan skima don a sami dacewa da tsohon sigogi.
In da gaske, ka nuna alƙaluman mako cikin kalandan.

local_schema.short_desc: Kayan aikin canza tsari na lokaci
Nuna kwanan wata cikin shawarar kayan aiki
local_schema.longdesc: In da gaske, ka nuna kwanan wata cikin wata shawarar kayan aiki, idan an sa manunin kan agogo.
In da gaske, ka nuna kwanan wata cikin agogon, a haɗe da lokaci.
In da gaske, ka nuna sakan cikin lokaci.

local_schema.short_desc: Sunan alamar kwandon sharan kwamfyutan tebur
local_schema.longdesc: Ana iya daidaita wannan suna idan kana son wani suna na ɗabi'a wa alamar kwandon shara kan kwamfyutan tebur.

local_schema.short_desc: Sunan alama na gidan kwamfyutan tebur
local_schema.longdesc: Ana iya daidaita wannan sunan idan kana son wani suna na ɗabi'a wa alamar gida a kan kwamfyutan tebur.
Za'a iya daidaita wannan suna idan kana son wani suna na ɗabi'a wa alamar kwamfyutan a kan kwamfyutan tebur.

local_schema.short_desc: Nuna ƙarfin murya da aka ɗaura kan kwamfyutan tebur
local_schema.longdesc: Idan an shirya zuwa gaske, za'a saka alamomi masu haɗa zuwa ƙarfin murya kan kwamfyutan tebur.

local_schema.short_desc: Ana iya ganin alamar Kwandon Shara kan kwamfyutan tebur
local_schema.longdesc: Idan an shirya zuwa gaske, za'a saka wata alama mai haɗa zuwa kwandon shara kan kwamfyutan tebur

local_schema.short_desc: Alamar kwamfyuta da ake gani kan kwamfyutan tebur
local_schema.longdesc: Idan an shirya zuwa gaske, za'a saka wata alama mai haɗa zuwa wurin kwamfyuta a kan kwamfyutan tebur.

local_schema.short_desc: Alama na gida da ake gani kan kwamfyutan tebur
local_schema.longdesc: Idan an shirya zuwa gaske, za'a saka wata alama mai haɗa zuwa shamis na gida kan kwamfyutan tebur.
Idan an shirya zuwa na gaskiya, Nautilus zai nuna shamis cikin layin gefe na bishiya kawai. Idan ba haka ba, zai nuna shamis da fayiloli tare.

local_schema.short_desc: Difwalt na tsarin layi tsaye da ke cikin kallon jerin
local_schema.longdesc: Difwalt na tsarin layi tsaye da ke cikin kallon jerin.

local_schema.short_desc: Difwalt na jerin layuka tsaye da ake iya gani cikin kallon jerin
local_schema.longdesc: Difwalt na jerin layuka tsaye da ana iya gani cikin kallon jerin.

local_schema.short_desc: Difwalt ɗin matsayin jawowa kusa da nesa na lissafi
local_schema.longdesc: Difwalt na matsayin jawowa kusa da nesa wanda kallon jeri ke amfani da.

local_schema.short_desc: Yi juyin waina na tsarin kasawa cikin sabobbin taga
local_schema.longdesc: In da gaske, za'a kasa fayilolin cikin tagogi ta tsarin juyin waina. misali, idan an tsara ta suna, maimakon kasa fayilolin daga "a" zuwa "z", za' a kasa su daga "z" zuwa "a".
Difwalt na tsarin-kasawa wa abubuwa masu cikin kallon jeri. Kima masu yiwu sune "suna", "girma", "nau'i", da "ranar_gyare-gyare".

local_schema.short_desc: Difwalt ɗin matsayin jawowa kusa da nesa na alama
local_schema.longdesc: Difwalt na matsayin jawowa kusa da nesa wanda kallon alama ke amfani da.

local_schema.short_desc: Yi amfani da tsari na hannu cikin sabobbin tagogi
local_schema.longdesc: In da gaske, sabobbin tagogi zasu yi amfani da tsari na hannu ta difwalt.
In da gaske, za'a sa lambobi a gefen alamomi maimakon a ƙarƙashin su.

local_schema.short_desc: Yi amfani da tsari mai ƙaushi cikin sabobbin tagogi
local_schema.longdesc: In da gaske, za'a shimfida shi ta difwalt ɗaɗaf cikin sabobbin tagogi.

local_schema.short_desc: Yi juyin waina na tsarin kasawa cikin sabobbin taga
local_schema.longdesc: In da gaske, za'a kasa fayiloli cikin sabobbin tagogi ta tsarin juyin waina. misali, idan an kasa su ta suna, maimakon a kasa fayilolin daga "a" zuwa "z", za'a kasa su daga "z" zuwa "a"; idan an kasa su ta girma, za'a kasa su ta ragewa maimakon ta ƙari.
Difwalt na tsarin-kasawa wa abubuwa masu cikin kallon alama. Kima masu yiwu sune "suna", "girma", "nau'i", "ranar_gyare-gyare", da "Tambarura".

local_schema.short_desc: Jerin kafshan masu yiwu na kan alamomi
local_schema.longdesc: Wani jerin kafshan a ƙasan wata alama da ke cikin kwamfyutan tebur da kallon alama. Ainihin yawan kafshan da za'a nuna ya danganta ga matsayin shirin jawowa kusa da nesa. Kima masu yiwu sune: "girma", "nau'i", "kwanan wata_da aka yi wa gyare-gyare", "kwanan watan_da aka sami shiga", "mai shi", "ƙungiya", "izini", "izinin_oktal" da "irin_mime".
Kallo na layin gefe wanda za'a nuna cikin sabobbin tagogi da aka buɗe.

local_schema.short_desc: Nuna layin gefe cikin sabobbin tagogi
local_schema.longdesc: Idan an shirya zuwa gaske, za'a samu ganin layin gefe na sabobbin tagogi da aka buɗe.

local_schema.short_desc: Nuna layin matsayi cikin sabobbin tagogi
local_schema.longdesc: Idan an shirya zuwa gaske, za'a samu ganin layi mai nuna matsayi na sabobbin tagogi da aka buɗe.

local_schema.short_desc: Nuna layin wuri cikin sabobbin tagogi
local_schema.longdesc: Idan an shirya zuwa na gaske, za'a samu ganin layin wuri na sabobbin tagogi da buɗe.

local_schema.short_desc: Nuna jerin kayan aiki cikin sabobbin tagogi
local_schema.longdesc: Idan an shirya zuwa gaske, za'a iya ganin layukan kayan aiki na sabobbin tagogi da aka buɗe.
Faɗin difwalt na layin gefen cikin sabobbin tagogi.
Tsari na kwanan watan fayiloli. Kima masu yiwu sune "locale", "iso", da "informal".

local_schema.short_desc: Difwalt na Layin Gefen Sunanfayil na Bango
local_schema.longdesc: Sunanfayil wa difwalt na layin gefe na bango. Ana amfani da shi kurum idan shirin_bangon_layin_gefe na gaske ne.

local_schema.short_desc: Difwalt na Layin Gefen Launin Bango
local_schema.longdesc: Sunanfayil wa difwalt na layin gefe na bango. Ana amfani da shi kurum idan shirin_bangon_layin_gefe na gaske ne.

local_schema.short_desc: Ɗabi'ar Layin Gefe na Shirin Bangon
local_schema.longdesc: Ko an daidaita wata ɗabi'ar difwalt na bangon layin gefe.
Sunanfayil wa difwalt na bangon shamis. Ana amfani da shi kurum idan shirin_bango na gaske ne.
Ko an daidaita wani ɗabi'ar difwalt na bangon shamis

Magwajin da ake amfani da idan za'a dace fayilolin da aka nema cikin layin bincike. Idan an daidaita shi zuwa "nemo_ta_rubutu", sannan Nautilus zai Nemi fayiloli ta sunan fayil kawai. Idan an daidaita shi zuwa "nemo_ta_rubutu_da_furofati", sannan Nautilus zai binciki fayiloli ta sunan fayil da furofati na fayil.

local_schema.short_desc: Nautilus na amfani da shamis na gida na masu amfani da, kamar kwamfyutan tebur
local_schema.longdesc: Idan an shirya zuwa gaske, sannan Nautilus zai yi amfani da shamis na gidan mai amfani da, don ya zama kwamfyutan tebur. Idan ƙarya ne, to sai ya yi amfani da ~/Kwamfyutan Tebur don ya zama kwamfyutan tebur.

local_schema.short_desc: Nautilus na sarrafa idan za'a zana kwamfyutan tebur
local_schema.longdesc: Idan an shirya zuwa gaske, sannan Nautilus zai zana alamomin a kan kwamfyutan tebur.

local_schema.short_desc: Nuna shamis da farko cikin tagogi
local_schema.longdesc: Idan an shirya zuwa gaske, sannan Nautilus zai nuna shamis kafin ya nuna fayiloli cikin kallo na alama da jeri.

local_schema.short_desc: Ko za'a duba sauti idan ana motsa linzami kan alama
Iyaka fayilolin da ake sarrafa cikin wani shamis
local_schema.longdesc: Za'a rage girmar shamis da suka fi wannan girma zuwa wannan girmar. Amfanin sa, don gudun hura shirin heap ba da ganga ba, ya kashe Nautilus kan makekiyar shamis. Wata kima mai korau na nufa babu bila haddin. Ana kimar iyakarsa saboda ana karanta shamis a-chakuɗe.

local_schema.short_desc: Iyaka girmar zane da za'a rage zuwa girmar 'ɗan yasta
local_schema.longdesc: Ba za'a rage girman zane-zane wanda suka wuce iyaka wannan girma (cikin bytes) zuwa girma na 'ɗan yasta ba. Amfanin wannan shiri don ya hana rage girman babbar zane-zane wanda zasu iya ɗau lokaci wajen lodi ko masu amfani da yawan ƙwaƙwalwa zuwa girmar 'ɗan yatsu.

local_schema.short_desc: Lokacin da ya kamata a nuna girmar ɗan yatsa na fayilolin sura
Jigon Nautilus na Yanzu (ya zama defriketed)
local_schema.longdesc: Sunan jigon Nautilus da za'a amfani da. Wannan ya zama dipriketed a lokaci shirin Nautilus 2.2. Don Allah, maimakon kwai, ka shigar da jigon alama.

local_schema.short_desc: Abin da za'a iya yi da fayilolin rubutu wanda za'a iya zartar da idan an kunna
local_schema.longdesc: Abin da za ka iya yi da fayilolin rubutu wanda za'a iya zartar da idan an kunna su (an danna sau ɗaya ko biyu). Kima masu yiwu sune "gabatar da" don a gabatar da su kamar shiryoyi, "yi tambaya" don ya yi tambaya ga abin da za'a yi ta wani zauren akwatin bayani, da "nuna" don ya nuna su kamar fayilolin rubutu.

local_schema.short_desc: Irin dannawa da aka amfani da wajen gabatar da/buɗe fayiloli
local_schema.longdesc: Kima masu yiwu sune "guda" don gabatar da fayiloli idan an danna sau ɗaya, ko "dobur" don gabatar da su idan an dannawa sau biyu.

local_schema.short_desc: Lokacin da ya kamata a nuna yawan abubuwa na cikin wani shamis
Lokacin da ya kamata a nuna shirin duba rubutu cikin alamomi

local_schema.longdesc: Idan an shirya zuwa gaskiya, sannan Nautilus zai sami wata siffa da zai yarda ka goge wani fayil da gaggawa, kuma cikin-wurin, maimakon motsa shi zuwa kwandon shara. Wannan siffa zai iya zama mai haɗari, sabo da haka, yi a tsanke.

local_schema.short_desc: Yana fara halin Nautilus na ainihi, inda duk tagogi zasu zama birawsa
local_schema.longdesc: Idan an shirya zuwa gaske, sannan duk tagogin Nautilus zasu zama tagogin birawsa. Haka Nautilus ke nuna hali kafin sigar 2.6, kuma wasu sun fi son wannan halin.
Idan an fara, zaman shawarar-gnome zai yi tambaya ga mai amfani da kwamfyuta kafin ya ƙarasar da zaman shawarar.

local_schema.short_desc: Yi ƙasa da taga a ƙarƙashin sauran tagogi
Motsa taga ta ƙasan filin aiki taki ɗaya
Motsa taga ta saman filin aiki taki ɗaya
Motsa taga ta daman filin aiki taki ɗaya
Motsa taga ta hagun filin aiki taki ɗaya

local_schema.longdesc: Wannan /apps/metacity/global_keybindings/run_command_window_screenshot key na ƙayyade wata kibaindin da ke sa a ƙira umarnin da wannan kewaye ta ƙayyade.
Wannan /apps/metacity/global_keybindings/run_command_screenshot key na bayyana kibaindin da ke sa a kira umarnin da wannan kewaye ke ƙayyade.

local_schema.short_desc: Umarnai da za'a tafiyar da cikin ba da amsa zuwa kibaindin
local_schema.longdesc: Wannan /apps/metacity/global_keybindings/run_command_N keys na bayyana kibaindin da suka dace da waɗannan umarnai. Idan an danna kibaindin wa tafiyar da_umarnin_N, zai zartar da umarnin_N.

local_schema.short_desc: Ka ɗau wani hoto na taga
Ka ɗau wani hoton fuskar kwamfyuta
Gusa baya-baya tsakanin fanel da kwamfyutan tebur yanzu-yanzu
Gusa tsakanin fanel da kwamfyutan tebur yanzu-yanzu
A tafiyar da wata umarnin a bayyane

local_schema.longdesc: Sunan wata filin aiki.

local_schema.short_desc: Ka kashe misfeature wanda tsohon shiryoyin ayuka ko shiryoyin ayuka wanda aka karya ke buƙata
(Ba'a zartar da shi ba) Neman hanya na aiki game da shirin ayuka, bada taga ba
In da gaske, ka sauya sauƙin amfani wa rage amfani na arziki

local_schema.longdesc: Yana gaya wa Metaciti yanda yakamata ya aiwatar da indiketa wanda ana gani, mai nuna cewa an danna ƙararrawar na'ura ko kuma an danna wata indiketa na shirin ayuka 'ƙararrawa' daban. A yanzu, akwai kima guda biyu masu inganci, "cikakkenfuska", mai jawo wata filash mai fari-baƙi ga cikakken fuska, da kuma "filash na_firam" da ke sa layin sunan shirin ayuka, wanda ya aika da alamar ƙararrawa ya yi filash. Idan ba'a san da shirin ayuka wanda ya aika da ƙararrawar ba (yawanci matsalar da ke shafi difwalt "ƙarar na'ura"), layin sunan taga da aka zura wa ido a lokacin zai yi filash.
Yana ƙudura ko da shirin ayuka ko kuma na'urar zai iya bada 'ƙara' da za'a iya ji; ko kuma wanda za'a iya amfani da tare da 'ƙararrawar da ake gani' don ya yarda da 'ƙaran' mai shiru.

local_schema.short_desc: Yi amfani da daidaitacciyar nau'in rubutu na na'ura cikin sunan taga
local_schema.longdesc: In da gaske, sai ka ƙyale zaɓe na nau'in rubutun_layinsuna, kuma ka yi amfani da daidaitacciyar nau'in rubutu na shiryoyin ayuka wa sunayen taga.
Jigon na ƙudura surar gefen taga, layin suna, da kaza da kaza.

local_schema.short_desc: Jinkiri cikin millisakan wa zaɓe na ɗagawa farat ɗaya
local_schema.longdesc: Jinkintar lokaci kafin a ɗaga wani taga idan an daidaita ɗagawa_farat ɗaya zuwa gaske. Ana ba da jinkintar cikin dubban sakan.

local_schema.short_desc: Yana ɗaga tagan da aka zura wa ido farat ɗaya
Aiki idan an danna layin suna sau-biyu

local_schema.longdesc: Shirin zura ido na taga na nuna yanda ake kunna tagogi. Yana da kima guda uku masu yiwu; ma'anar "danna" shine ya kamata a danna tagogi don a samu a zura musu ido, ma'anar "sloppy" shine ana zura ma tagogi ido idan linzami ta shiga tagan, da ma'anar "linzami" shine ana zura wa tagogi ido idan linzamin ta shiga tagan kuma ana cire idon idan linzamin ta bar tagan.

local_schema.short_desc: Shirin Gyare-Gyare da za'a yi amfani da wa ayukan danne-dannen tagan da aka yi wa gyare-gyare
